self_predictions.prediction_summary: Believes he is in his best ever shape, 30% stronger than during Zloty Tour in 2019. Thinks it's a 50-50 match but has faith in his victory.
self_predictions.style_conflict: Believes his chances are better in a hook battle than a top roll battle.

John Brzenk.strength: Respects John's technical prowess and experience.
John Brzenk.previous_match_summary: Never pulled John before, so unsure what to expect.

self_predictions.prediction_summary: Has fought Zurab before and understands how to pull him. Believes he will win.

Zurab Tavberidze.previous_match_summary: Lost to Zurab in European Championship but won in World Championship a few months later.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Thinks it will be a tough match but Ermes will win.

Ermes Gasparini.strength: Part of the new generation of armwrestlers.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Believes Devon won't have enough time to prepare and Prudnik will win.

Devon Larratt.strength: Doesn't think Devon is in his best shape currently.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Thinks Morozov will win due to his style and ability to adjust during matches.

Artyom Morozov.strength: Surprised by his progress and strength.
Artyom Morozov.previous_match_summary: Impressed by his performance against Dave Chaffee and draw with Dadikyan.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Believes Petrenko's finger and wrist strength will be enough to hold John's top roll and dominate in the hook.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Thinks Petrenko's chances are better in a hook battle.

John Brzenk.strength: Respects John's technical skills and experience.

Oleg Petrenko.strength: Impressed by his overall power and shape.
